ctu_text:
Family Pension Scheme 3. Barxik Silpi Sanman (Ex-Gratia Grant) Scheme 4. One-time Special Financial Assistance to Families of deceased artist Scheme
The main objective of the Scheme is to support the artist and needy families of Artists who made contributions to the field of Art and Culture in the State of Assam. It also aims to provide Financial assistance to the artist and their families in different schemes.
